data.title: Aoyama Gakuin University [2024 Rankings by topic]
data.meta_description: Aoyama Gakuin University ranked 68th in Japan and 1196th in the World 2024 overall rankings, while got 348th place for Condensed Matter Physics and top 50% for 74 other topics. See all 134 academic rankings both national and global.
data.meta_site_name: EduRank.org - Discover university rankings by location
data.text:
Aoyama Gakuin University: Rankings

Updated: February 29, 2024

EduRank

Aoyama Gakuin University ranked 68th in Japan, 1196th in the global 2024 rating, and scored in the TOP 50% across 75 research topics. Aoyama Gakuin University ranking is based on 3 factors: research output (EduRank's index has 9,409 academic publications and 118,494 citations attributed to the university), non-academic reputation, and the impact of 80 notable alumni.

Ranking Category #1196 of 14,131 In the World #308 of 5,830 In Asia #68 of 719 In Japan #20 of 84 In Tokyo #348 of 3,091 For Condensed Matter Physics #585 of 1,024 For Product and Industrial Design #656 of 1,383 For Engineering Management #93 of 7,738 For Alumni Impact #1258 of 14,131 For Non-academic Prominence Top50% For 72 other topics
